title: How to Play Steam VR Games on an Oculus Quest 2

steps.title: Make sure you meet the requirements.
steps.content: Make sure you meet the requirements. To play Steam games on an Oculus Quest 2 as smoothly as possible, your system and Wi-Fi must meet the minimum requirements. [1] X Research source Operating System : Windows 10 or 11. This will not work on macOS. Processor : Intel i5-4590 or above or AMD Ryzen 5 1500 X or above. Graphics : NVIDIA GTX and AMD 400 and above Memory : 8GB RAM or above Internet : 5 GHZ Wi-Fi or Ethernet connection

steps.title: Download the Oculus app onto your computer.
steps.content: Download the Oculus app onto your computer. You can find the download on the official website here . This program is needed to connect your Oculus headset to your computer. You should already have Steam and any VR-compatible game downloaded to your computer. If you don't, install it first .

steps.title: Download SteamVR.
steps.content: Download SteamVR. You can find this in the Steam library. Search for "SteamVR" and download it to your computer.

steps.title: Open the Oculus app on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Oculus app on your computer. This should be open while you connect your Oculus via Air Link. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Put on the Oculus headset and go to Settings.
steps.content: Put on the Oculus headset and go to Settings . This will be in the top-left corner of the Apps window. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Toggle on Air Link.
steps.content: Toggle on Air Link . This will be on the Features tab.

steps.title: Select Continue.
steps.content: Select Continue . A new window will open with a menu.

steps.title: Select Oculus Air Link.
steps.content: Select Oculus Air Link . This is the square on the right side of the window.

steps.title: Select your computer name and select Pair.
steps.content: Select your computer name and select Pair . You should see your computer name underneath the Available PCs header. This will take a moment to connect. When it does, you'll see a code on both your computer and headset. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Select Confirm.
steps.content: Select Confirm. Make sure the codes match. If they do not match, select Cancel and try again. Make sure you're selecting the correct computer. Your Oculus headset is now connected to your computer.

steps.title: On the Oculus, select Desktop.
steps.content: On the Oculus, select Desktop . This is the monitor icon in the row of apps at the bottom of the screen. You'll need to use the Oculus to open the necessary programs through your computer.

steps.title: On the Oculus, find SteamVR and select Launch.
steps.content: On the Oculus, find SteamVR and select Launch . SteamVR will open with a completely new background. The window will show your Steam library.

steps.title: On the Oculus, select a game.
steps.content: On the Oculus, select a game. This must be a VR-compatible game, such as Phasmophobia, Among Us, or another game. The game will launch on your Oculus headset. For the best, immersive experience, use headphones as you play.

steps.title: Turn on and connect the Oculus Quest 2.
steps.content: Turn on and connect the Oculus Quest 2. Use a long USB-C to connect your headset to your computer.

steps.title: Launch the Oculus app.
steps.content: Launch the Oculus app. You'll see a list of tabs in the left panel. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click Devices.
steps.content: Click Devices . This will be below Events .

steps.title: Click Add Headset.
steps.content: Click Add Headset . This is at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Click Link (Cable).
steps.content: Click Link (Cable) . This is the left option. You may need to click Continue a few times to finish connecting.

steps.title: Put on the Oculus Quest 2.
steps.content: Put on the Oculus Quest 2. Your computer's desktop will now appear in the headset. If it doesn't immediately appear, select the monitor icon in the bottom-right corner.

steps.title: On the Oculus, find SteamVR and select Launch.
steps.content: On the Oculus, find SteamVR and select Launch . SteamVR will open with a completely new background. The window will show your Steam library.

steps.title: On the Oculus, select a game.
steps.content: On the Oculus, select a game. This must be a VR-compatible game, such as Phasmophobia , Among Us , or another game. The game will launch on your Oculus headset. For the best, immersive experience, use headphones as you play.
